title: Acid
summary: Acid is a advanced agricultural products.
game_description:
Dilute acid for high current generation in diverse power cells. 

Crafted from Mordite and Fungal Mould.
source_info: *Blueprint can be awarded by completing a certain stage of Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Pathfinder - Added as a trade commodity.
* Atlas Rises - Blueprint changed, formerly used Temerium.
* NEXT - Value changed, formerly it was worth 288,000.0
additional_info: *Acid is tied with Dirt and Iron for the shortest item name in the current version of No Manâ€™s Sky, with 4 characters.

title: Amino Chamber
summary: Amino Chamber is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
A specialist biological catalyzation device.

This unit takes advantage of naturally occurring enzymes in order to facilitate increased energy yields and faster processing in a wide range of advanced technologies.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Origins - Added as a product.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.

title: Antimatter
summary:
Antimatter is a component and the last ingredient needed to craft a Warp Cell.  

Once you have built your first Hyperdrive, the mission will take you to an abandoned building. The terminal there will give you the antimatter blueprint.
game_description:
Contained negative matter and baryogenesis antiparticles.

The vast energy potential of antimatter makes it highly valuable. 95% of existing antimatter consumption is in the powering of starship hyperdrives.

WARNING: uncontained usage is not recommended.
source_info:
* Can be automatically harvested by Cargo Drops or Barrel Fabricators.
* Can sometimes be bought at Galactic Trade Terminals or from NPCs.
*
release_history:
* Release - Added as a product.
* NEXT - Blueprint changed, formerly used Electron Vapour, Heridium and Zinc.

title: Antimatter Housing
summary: Antimatter Housing is a component needed to craft a Warp Cell.
game_description:
Secure antimatter containment device, required before Antimatter can be safely secured as Warp Cells.

Rebound Oxygen forms a protective gas pocket, preventing the antimatter from reacting with the surrounding casing.
source_info:
Antimatter Housing can be purchased at Technology Merchants.

This item has a 10% chance to drop out of barrel-type cargo.   The AtlasPass v1 access card is required to open these.
release_history: * NEXT - Added as a product.

title: Archive Bypass Implant
summary: Archive Bypass Implant is a Planetary Archive.
game_description: A biotechnical firewall, developed as a safeguard against textual cognitohazards.  It is coated in something slippery, and has started to bubble along the surface.
source_info:
* Blueprint is received as a reward from Hunt 3, Milestone 4 They Pushed too Far as part of Expedition 4: Emergence.
* Must be constructed using the blueprint.
release_history:
* Frontiers - This item was added to the game as part of the Expedition 4.
* Waypoint - Renamed, formerly "Archive Override Implant".

title: Carrier AI Fragment
summary: Carrier AI Fragment is a component. It is specifically used to detect crashed Sentinel Interceptors. It is very useful if you want to gain a Sentinel Interceptor.
game_description:
A single splinter of the colossal mainframe at the heart of a Sentinel capital ship. It blinks, its solitary living eye trained upon the one piece of data it retains - the last known location of one of its fleet of Interceptors.

Select the AI Fragment and use Search Archive (E) to translate information about Interceptor's crash site to your starship's navigation systems.
source_info:
*Dropped from Nexus missions (1-2%)
*Gained occasionally from successful combat frigate expeditions (2.7%)
release_history:
* Interceptor - Added as a component
* Echoes - Renamed, was "Dreadnought AI Fragment"

title: Circuit Board
summary: Circuit Board is a tradeable and it is worth 916,250.0
game_description:
Stackable, semi-flexible circuit board made from a highly durable synthetic polymer.

Crafted from Heat Capacitors and Poly Fibre.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Foundation - Added as a product.
* NEXT 1.64 - Fixed an issue where players could fail to learn the Circuit Board blueprint at the correct time.
* NEXT 1.58 - Value changed, previously it was worth 1,196,250.0
additional_info:
* The blueprint is rewarded when you construct the Overseer
* Since you only need to grow four different plants (Frost Crystal, Solanium, Cactus Flesh, and Star Bulb), these can be an effective way of making money.

title: Cryogenic Chamber
summary: Cryogenic Chamber is a tradeable that can be crafted or purchased.
game_description:
A low temperature chamber, designed to prevent the natural decay of organic matter.

Crafted from Living Glass and a Cryo-Pump.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history: * NEXT 1.58 - Icon and value changed, previously it was worth 4,800,000.0

title: Crystallised Heart
summary: Crystallised Heart is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
The functional core of a Sentinel quadruped unit, but warped beyond all recognition. The entire machine is infested with a crystalline material that pulses wildy upon inspection.

A close analysis reveals the machinery itself appears to have been reconfigured, stretching and warping into a whole new form, writhing in the presence of these radiant shards of glass.
source_info: Loot from a Corrupted Sentinel Quadruped
use_info: Crystallised Heart is used in the repair of Sentinel multi-tools.
release_history: * Interceptor - Added as a product.

title: Di-hydrogen Jelly
summary: Di-hydrogen Jelly is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
A faintly-glowing jelly. Its gentle light and soft wobble belie the fact that this sticky gel is both highly toxic and highly flammable. Skin contact is to be avoided at all costs.

Synthesised from Di-hydrogen.
source_info: Available from some
release_history:
* NEXT - Added as a product.
* Fractal - Exploit nerfed.
additional_info:
* It is required to repair the starship's Launch Thruster.
* Exploit - If you have a refiner, you can exploit di-hydrogen by refining Di-hydrogen Jelly from 30 di-hydrogen and then refining it back into 40 di-hydrogen.

title: Emergency Signal Scanner
summary:
Emergency Signal Scanner is a derelict freighters.

They are considered an expensive item and prices may escalate in accordance with demand. Prices start from 5M
game_description:
A single-use receiver that scans for distress signals on freighter frequencies. Derelict or abandoned freighters often contain high-value salvage.

Select the Receiver and use Tune Signal (X/Xbox; 'E'/PC or File:PSBUTTON.SQUARE.png/PS4) to begin the location process.
source_info:
*Can be purchased from the Scrap Dealer aboard the Space Station.
*Can be received as a reward from Nexus missions.
*Iteration: Helios aboard the Space Anomaly offers a free Emergency Signal Scanner each week
release_history:
* Desolation - This item was added to the game as technology.
* Waypoint - Renamed, formerly "Emergency Broadcast Receiver".
* Waypoint - Iteration: Helios no longer offers a free Emergency Signal Scanner each week.
* Update 4.25 - Iteration: Helios offers a free Emergency Signal Scanner each week again.
additional_info:
* After activation, you need to travel via pulse drive in any direction to detect a derelict freighter.
* If standard exosuit inventory is full and more than one scanner is owned, activation will fail as "Receiver Temporarily Jammed"; one slot must be clear for a scanner to convert to the "active" form.
* If the scanner is placed in the Personal Refiner, it will not be consumed upon opening the airlock and will become inactive upon completion of the derelict.

title: Explosive Drones
summary: Explosive Drones is a consumable product and one of the upgrades available for frigates. It is a temporary upgrade which boosts the Combat capabilities of a frigate fleet for a single expedition by 10 points.
game_description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

This pack of autonomous explosives have been programmed to launch from the fleet and pilot themselves directly towards hostile vessels. Extremely dangerous.
source_info:
* The product's blueprint is a possible reward from a Manufacturing Facility or Operations Centre.
* The blueprint can be researched at the Upgrade Control terminal for one Salvaged Frigate Module.
* A possible drop from Sentinel starships.
release_history:
* NEXT - Added as a product, with frigate-related function. It has the same icon as Comet Droplets and Solenoid.
* Beyond - Added an ability to research a blueprint at the Freighter Research Terminal.

title: Fuel Oxidiser
summary:
Fuel Oxidiser is a consumable product and one of the upgrades available for frigates. It is a temporary upgrade which reduces the expedition's duration of a frigate fleet for a single expedition by 10 points.

The British spelling of this phrase is used in the wiki.
game_description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

This powerful fuel upgrade overloads frigate engines, allowing for faster-than-usual travel.
source_info:
* The product's blueprint is a possible reward from a Manufacturing Facility or Operations Centre.
* The blueprint can be researched at the Upgrade Control terminal for one Salvaged Frigate Module.
release_history:
* NEXT - Added as a product, with frigate-related function. It has the same icon as Fusion Core and Load Balancer.
* Beyond - Added an ability to research a blueprint at the Freighter Research Terminal.

title: Glass
summary: Glass is a tradeable item that can be used in construction and base building. It can also be used for decoration and room parts other than windows.
game_description:
Shatter-proof, scratch-resistant glass with a self-cleaning, UV-cured coating, for general construction use.

Refined from Silicate powder. Extract silicate from the earth with a Terrain Manipulator.

Can be crafted from Frost Crystals extracted from plants on frozen worlds.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* NEXT 1.64 - Fixed an issue where players could fail to learn the Glass blueprint at the correct time.
* Beyond - Players can now refine 40 Silicate Powder into 1 Glass.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.

title: Hardframe Engine
summary: Hardframe Engine is a component that is used for upgrading.
game_description:
This complex mechanical unit was once the central combustion chamber at the heart of a Sentinel Hardframe unit.

Though now cool to the touch, it still glows with a sinister red heat...
source_info:
* Loot from a Sentinel hardframe
* Interact with barrel to obtain. Destroying it will cause loss of loot.
release_history: * SentinelUp - Added as a component.

title: Harmonic Brain
summary: Harmonic Brain is a component that is used for upgrading.
game_description:
The central processing unit of a Sentinel interceptor ship. The circuitry appears stable, pulsing with a regular electrical heartbeat. It no longer reacts angrily to my presence.

Status: DOCILE

Install this unit in a disabled Sentinel ship to unlock its vestigial cockpit and enable manual piloting.
source_info: * Received by presenting a Hyaline Brain to a Monolith
use_info: Harmonic Brain is used in the repair of Sentinel Interceptors.
release_history: * Interceptor - Added as a component.

title: Heat Capacitor
summary: Heat Capacitor is a component used in crafting.
game_description:
A thermal regulator produced from refined organic material. It is unique in its ability to produce, dissipate and distribute heat as required.

Crafted from Frost Crystals.
source_info: *Blueprint can be awarded by completing a certain stage of Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
use_info: * Used as a construction component in Planetary Settlements.
release_history:
* Atlas Rises - Added as product.
* NEXT - It has the same icon as Blown Transistor.
* Visions - Value changed, previously it was worth 240,000.0
additional_info: It resembles the lamps seen in space stations and Trading Posts.

title: Hermetic Seal
summary: Hermetic Seal is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
A high-performance carbon seal, able to withstand both the harsh interstellar environment and the rigours of intensive, high-energy industrial use.

User is advised to regularly check seal integrity after installation.
source_info: Available from some
release_history:
* NEXT - Added as product. It has the same icon as Teleport Coordinators.
* ExoMech - Added as an ingredient for Exocraft Hazard Protection upgrades such as Thermal Buffer
additional_info:
* It is required to repair the starship's Pulse Engine
*It is a bad idea to help a new player out while they are doing the first mission Awakenings, as it can cause a variety of problems. For example, giving them a Hermetic Seal will cause them to never get the blueprint for it; as the game expects them to get it from a nearby building near the start of the game.

title: Holographic Analyser
summary: Holographic Analyser is a consumable product and one of the upgrades available for frigates. It is a temporary upgrade which boosts the Exploration capabilities of a frigate fleet for a single expedition by 10 points.
game_description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

This powerful analytic computer overclocks the existing fleet systems, allowing for faster-than-light calculations. Heat is a problem, and the chips do not last long.
source_info:
* The product's blueprint is a possible reward from a Manufacturing Facility or Operations Centre.
* The blueprint can be researched at the Upgrade Control terminal]] for one Salvaged Frigate Module.
release_history: * NEXT - Added as a product, with frigate-related function. It has the same icon as:

title: Hyaline Brain
summary:
Hyaline Brain is a component which, when purified into a Harmonic Brain at a Monolith, is used to make a crashed Sentinel Interceptor claimable.
When the player has 3 Radiant Shard and 1 Inverted Mirror (collected from a Dissonance Resonator) in their inventory the Hyaline Brain can be probed in the inventory (by pressing E on PC) revealing the location of the closest Monolith.
game_description:
The central processing unit of a Sentinel interceptor ship. The circuitry writhes microscopically, constantly rearranging itself as it scans for anomalies.

A vital component for any entity wishing to construct their own Pilot Interface for a Sentinel Interceptor.

Status: VOLATILE
source_info:
* Loot from crashed Sentinel Interceptors (100%).
* Loot from destroying enemy sentinel interceptors in space (15%)
use_info: Hyaline Brain is used in the repair of Sentinel Interceptors.
release_history: * Interceptor - Added as a component.
additional_info: Hyaline Brain can be transformed into a Harmonic Brain at a Monolith.

title: Hydraulic Wiring
summary: Hydraulic Wiring is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
Specialist wiring and control threads, this flexible material allows the transmission of power and signals, as well as offering direct manipulation of remote components.

Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
*Origins - Added as a product.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.

title: Inverted Mirror
summary: Inverted Mirror is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
A pane of watchful g l a s s, retrieved from the smoking remains of the corrupted swarm's Dissonance Resonators. It emits more light than it reflects, casting a faint purple hue on its surroundings.

Highly sought after for salvage operations, as it can be used to bypass the security systems of key Sentinel ship technologies.
source_info:
* Loot from a Dissonance Resonator with the Inverted Mirror tag.
* May also be found on Harmonic Scrap.
use_info: Inverted Mirror is used in the repair of Sentinel multi-tools and crashed Interceptors.
release_history: * Interceptor - Added as a component.
additional_info: When a Dissonance Resonator is destroyed, it will drop either an Inverted Mirror or an Echo Locator. Which it will drop is indicated by a tag below its name on the HUD when you are close to it.

title: Ion Battery
summary: Ion Battery is a consumable product.
game_description:
Convenient and optimised power storage unit. Used in a wide variety of defensive and hazard protection systems.

Constructed by fusing Ferrite Dust with underground Cobalt. Frequently found ready-made in cylindrical metal containers.
use_info:
Ion Batteries can be used to recharge the following items:
* Hazard Protection
* Thermal Protection Upgrade (Heat)
* Thermal Protection Upgrade (Cold)
* Radiation Protection Upgrade
* Toxic Protection Upgrade

Ion Batteries can be used to tame any mechanical fauna from the genus Mechanoceris or Structurae.
release_history:
* Prisms - Now need 5 Ferrite Dust for craft instead 20.
* Waypoint - Only available for purchase on "Goods Availability->Abundant" setting.

title: Life Support Gel
game_description:
Emergency life support fuel.

Synthesised from rocket fuel crystals and carbon, this gel offers a temporary boost to life support systems. Long-term impact on user's lungs is currently unknown.
release_history:
*Origins - Now gives 100% charge to Life Support, previously gave 50%. Replaced Oxygen Capsule in all recipes. Icon changed.
*Waypoint - Only available for purchase on "Goods Availability->Abundant" setting.
additional_info: *Provides 100% charge to Life Support when consumed. Despite the tooltip, it does not seem to damage the user's lungs in the long term.

title: Liquid Explosive
summary: Liquid Explosive is an advanced agricultural product.
game_description:
A general purpose high explosive, offered in liquid form for convenience of transport and deployment. Do not drink.

Crafted from Acid and Unstable Gel.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Atlas Rises - added as an agricultural product
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.
additional_info: The Liquid Explosive blueprint is rewarded when you construct the Science Terminal and complete the Scientist quest line.

title: Living Glass
summary: Living Glass is a tradeable item.
game_description:
An advanced building material, this glass has been imbued with organic compounds that allow it to react to the environment. Microbes within the glass filter harmful light of all wavelengths and balance the atmosphere as required.

Crafted from Lubricant and Glass.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Atlas Rises - Added as a component.
* NEXT - Blueprint changed, the required amount of Glass is increased from 1 to 5.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.
additional_info: The blueprint is rewarded when you construct the Science Terminal and complete the Scientist quest line.

title: Lost Bathysphere
summary: Lost Bathysphere is a consumable that is immediately consumed when received. It is an unlockable helmet for the Anomaly race at the Appearance Modifier.
game_description:
A haunted Exosuit Appearance Override. Even once removed, the wearer will forever hear the whispering call of the deep ocean...
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.
source_info:
It can be acquired as a reward from the Dreams of the Deep secondary mission.

It was also provided as an award for completing the Marine Biology mission in Phase 4 of Expedition 5: Exobiology.
release_history: * Beyond - Added as a consumable.

title: Lubricant
summary: Lubricant is a advanced agricultural products.
game_description:
A synthetic lubricant that reduces wear and prolongs the lifespan of technologies with moving parts.

Crafted from Faecium and Gamma Root.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Foundation - Added as a component.
* Atlas Rises - Blueprint changed, formerly used Mordite.
* Beyond - Blueprint changed, formerly used Coprite and Gamma Root.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.
additional_info:
* The blueprint is rewarded when you construct the Science Terminal and begin the Scientist quest line. 
* This is the only agricultural crafted product that allows you to store up to twenty (20) units in a single regular slot rather than the usual five (5) units.

title: Magnetic Resonator
summary: Magnetic Resonator is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
An electromagnetic frequency oscillator, able to function in a wide-range of conditions thanks to both ferrous and non-ferrous magnetic properties.

Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Origins - Added as a product.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.

title: Metal Plating
summary: Metal Plating is a component that is used for crafting and repairing.
game_description:
A lightweight metal product, heavily used in the manufacture of starship parts and deployable technology. A mainstay of the construction industries of all known primary species.

Crafted from Ferrite Dust.
release_history: * NEXT - This product replaced Carite Sheet. It has the same icon as Shattered Bulwark.
additional_info:
thumb|Damaged ship components
While used for general construction, these platings can also be used to repair certain ship equipment.

title: Microprocessor
summary: Microprocessor is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
A compact, low-heat microchip. Assembled from processed Chromatic Metal, created from one of several specialised terrain metals.

Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.
source_info: *Blueprint can be awarded in the Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* NEXT - Added as a product.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.

title: Mind Ark
summary: Mind Ark is a curiosity that is used in the Artemis quest line.
game_description: A strange piece of technology, a gift from beyond the stars. It shimmers in a way that suggests it is not fully in this world.
release_history:
* Atlas Rises - Added as a product.
* NEXT - Blueprint changed, formerly used Platinum, Living Glass and Circuit Board.
* Beyond - Blueprint changed, formerly used Chromatic Metal, Living Glass and Microprocessor.
* Update 4.25 - Name changed, was "Mind Arc"

title: Mind Control Device
summary:
Mind Control Device is a consumable product and one of the upgrades available for frigates. It is a temporary upgrade which boosts the Trade capabilities of a frigate fleet for a single expedition by 10 points.

It is also used as an upgrade material for some Planetary Settlement buildings.
game_description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

The mind control device plugs into the ship's trading and communications systems, allowing the Fleet Commander to gain the upper hand in any negotiation.
source_info:
* The product's blueprint is a possible reward from a Manufacturing Facility or Operations Centre.
* The blueprint can be researched at the Upgrade Control terminal for one Salvaged Frigate Module.
* Possible drop from Sentinel starships.
release_history:
* NEXT - Added as a product, with frigate-related function. It has the same icon as High Capacity Vector Compressor.
* Beyond - Added an ability to research a blueprint at the Freighter Research Terminal.
* Origins - Blueprint changed, previously used Sodium Diode.
* Beacon - Used as upgrade material for new settlement building upgrade process.

title: Mineral Compressor
summary: Mineral Compressor is a consumable product and one of the upgrades available for frigates. It is a temporary upgrade which boosts the Industrial capabilities of a frigate fleet for a single expedition by 10 points.
game_description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

The mineral compressor allows fleet mining crews to liquidise the substances they extract, for both faster processing and easier transportation.
source_info:
* The product's blueprint is a possible reward from a Manufacturing Facility or Operations Centre.
* The blueprint can be researched at the Upgrade Control terminal for one Salvaged Frigate Module.
release_history:
* NEXT - Added as a product, with frigate-related function. It has the same icon as Boiler Unit and Organic Piping, while Oxygen Filter has a different colored icon.
* Beyond - Added an ability to research a blueprint at the Freighter Research Terminal.
* Origins - Blueprint changed, previously used Cobalt Mirror.

title: Night Crystals
summary:
Naturally glowing crystalline clusters.

Used in the creation of technological devices and starship manufacture.
source_info:
Purchasable on the galactic trade network for roughly 35,000 units.

It is possible to obtain these from Damaged Containers (Very rare!)
additional_info: * At this point, the only game usage for Night Crystals is trading

title: Pirate Transponder
summary: Pirate Transponder is a component.
game_description:
A unique ID transponder, ripped from the internal signal array of an outlaw starship.

Possesion
source_info: *Occasionally received on destroying pirate Starships.
release_history: * Orbital - Added to the game.
additional_info: It can be given to Mercenaries Guild Envoys to earn standing.

title: Poly Fibre
summary: Poly Fibre is a tradeable that can be crafted or purchased.
game_description:
A connective fibre for electronics, made from an advanced synthetic polymer and capable of serving as a conduit for power and data.

Crafted from Cactus Flesh and Star Bulbs.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Atlas Rises - Added as a trade commodity.
* NEXT - Value changed, previously it was worth 200,000.0
additional_info: The blueprint is rewarded when you construct the Science Terminal and continue the Scientific Research quest line.

title: Portable Reactor
summary: Portable Reactor is a tradeable that can be crafted or purchased.
game_description:
A miniature self-controlled nuclear reactor. Generates sub-stellar levels of energy in a hassle-free, widely compatible fuel module.

Crafted from Liquid Explosives and Fusion Accelerant.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history: * NEXT 1.58 - Value changed, previously it was worth 5,000,000.0

title: Projectile Ammunition
summary:
Projectile Ammunition is a Universal Ammo Modules.

It can be inserted in Multi-tool clip reloading system and used with Boltcaster, Pulse Spitter, Scatter Blaster and Incinerator. Crafting this item produces 1250 units of Projectile Ammunition, and each stack can hold up to 9,999 units.
game_description:
Advanced munition fragments, constructed to fit Universal Multi-Tool Standard 07/FF1.

Easily inserted into the Boltcaster, Pulse Spitter and Scatter Blaster via the Multi-Tool clip reloading system.
release_history:
* NEXT - This item was introduced as a product.
* Beyond - Crafting recipe modified, reducing number of required input

title: Quad Servo
summary: Quad Servo is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description: A highly sprung motor arm salvaged from inside of a Sentinel patrol unit. It occasionally twitches, as if experiencing the echo of combat.
source_info:
It can be obtained by the following methods:
* destroying the Combat Supplies containers dropped by Sentinel Quads
* Suspicious Packet (Goods) from the Scrap Dealer
* a gift from Guild Envoys of the Mercenaries Guild
release_history: * NEXT - Added as a product. It has the same icon as Non-Stick Piston.

title: Quantum Computer
summary: Quantum Computer is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
An extremely fast advanced processing unit. Allows real-time solving of otherwise impossible calculations. However, protection against decoherence is not guaranteed.

Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Origins - Added as a product.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.
additional_info: This component is used for Planetary Settlements.

title: Quantum Processor
summary: Quantum Processor is a tradeable that can be crafted or purchased.
game_description:
A highly advanced computational device, essential for the complex calculations involved in warp travel.

Crafted from Circuit Boards and Superconductors.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Atlas Rises - Added as a trade item.
* NEXT - It has the same icon as Master Circuit, Navigation Data and certain Upgrade Module types.
* Visions - Value reduced from 5,200,000 to 4,400,000
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.
additional_info: If a player is attempting to farm the highest-level Tradeable items, they should account for the fact that one quantum processor is required for both recipes when designing their farm.

title: Radiant Brain
summary: Radiant Brain is a component that is used for upgrading.
game_description: Shifting nanite clusters sewn together with a Messenger of the Atlas.
source_info: * Loot a Walker Brain from a Sentinel Walker and take it to Tethys near the Portal on the Space Anomaly.
release_history: * SentinelUp - Added as a product.

title: Radiant Shard
summary: Radiant Shard is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
A fragment of glassy lifeforce, chipped from a larger formation. Dynamic intermolecular binding gives the shard a strangely flexible, sinewy quality. It writhes gently, almost as if it were seeking something...

Highly sought after for salvage operations, as it can be used to bypass the security systems of key Sentinel ship technologies.
source_info: * Mining large purple crystals on Dissonant Planets.
release_history: * Interceptor - Added as a product.

title: Rebuilt Exosuit Module
summary: Rebuilt Exosuit Module is a consumable product that yields Salvaged Upgrade Components when used.
game_description: A salvaged upgrade for the Exosuit. Use (
source_info: Purchased with Void Motes from Autophage Synthesis Terminals and Harmonic Interfaces.
release_history: * Echoes - Added as a consumable.

title: Repair Kit
summary:
thumb|Finding repair kits
Repair Kit is a consumable product. It can be used to repair broken equipment components without having to use standard materials. This is especially useful if the repair materials are expensive or difficult to find. 

It can be used to repair actual systems in a starship (Pulse Drive, Launch Thrusters, etc.). Can be used to repair slots. However, each repair kit will only repair one subcomponent of a broken module or inventory slot. Technology requiring three different materials will require three repair kits.

This product can be harvested from a Derelict Freighter. Soon after entering, a room is reached with a large computer screen on the left and a crate on the right. If the supplies from this box are claimed, repair kit(s) will be part of the resulting collection.
game_description:
A highly useful piece of survival technology, the Repair Kit allows damaged equipment to be quickly and efficiently restored to working order.

While repairing a piece of techology
source_info:
*Purchased from Contraband Agent for around 100,000 Nexus Missions
*Bought at the Scrap Dealer for 811-828 Tainted Metal
*Opened from Suspicious Packet (Goods)
*Purchased from Harmonic Camp terminals for around 200 Void Mote
release_history: *Desolation - Added to the game.

title: Salvaged Fleet Unit
summary:
Salvaged Fleet Unit is a consumable that can be installed in the tech slots of a freighter to boost the stats of your freighter or frigates.

Can be deployed to improve...

* its Hyper-drive
* the speed of your fleet
* the fuel efficiency of your fleet
* combat performance of your fleet
* exploration abilities of your fleet
* mining capabilities of your fleet
* trading abilities of your fleet
game_description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.

Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the speed of your fleet.

A options:
* the hyperdrive unit
* fleet coordination hardware

B options:
* primary drive
* long-range outfitting systems
* long-range communication systems
* long-range communication array
* long-range defensive systems
* long-range scanning systems

C options:
* hyperdrive range and efficiency
* expedition fuel efficiency
* expedition speed
* combat and defense abilities of all expeditions
* the exploration and scientific abilities of all expeditions
* the trade abilities of all expeditions
* the industrial abilities of all expeditions
source_info:
* Final reward from Derelict Freighters (100%)
* Destroying NPC freighters, guaranteed S-Class (70%)
* Explorers Guild Envoy (Requires guild standing level 9)
release_history: *Desolation - Added to the game.
additional_info:
*There are no X-class Salvaged Fleet Units
*Even though the highest hyperdrive range listed is 250 ly, there is a difference between upgrade modules due to rounding. As of 2022-08-14 the highest stat module is the one from SV Yellow Miura allowing to reach 6405.1 range with 181 ly base range freighter.

title: Salvaged Glass
summary: Salvaged Glass is a component, specifically Recovered Sentinel Components. It can be shattered to yield various components or Sentinel Upgrade Modules.
game_description:
A sinister shard of purple glass, salvaged from the destroyed remains of Sentinel machinery. Its walls are thin, and it may be broken down to access valuable Sentinel components.

Select in the Inventory (
source_info: * May be recovered from crashed Sentinel Interceptors on dissonant planets.
use_info:
Shattering Salvaged Glass will yield one of the following:
* Nanites
release_history: * SentinelUp - Added as a component.

title: Solar Mirror
summary: Solar Mirror is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
A specialist optical component. Employing an impossibly polished surface, this mirror is able to selectively filter different wavelengths of light, changing its reflective pattern based on nearby magnetic fields.

Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Origins - Added as a product.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.

title: Soul Engine
summary: Soul Engine is a curiosity and used in crafting the Mind Arc during The First Traveller mission.
game_description:
A powerful organic computing unit.

A glitching beat drives this miracle circuit, performing cycle after cycle in an endless, furious loop of calculation.
source_info: The blueprint is acquired from -null- during The First Traveller mission.
release_history: * Beyond - Added as a product. It has the same, but a different colored icon as State Phasure.

title: Starshield Battery
summary: Starshield Battery is a consumable and one of the portable energy storages.
game_description:
A power storage unit optimised for use in starship defensive systems.

Tritium-fuelled capacitors provide quick-release charge for the Deflector Shield, but would overload smaller-scale equipment.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Beyond - Added as a consumable.
* NextGen - Price per unit decreased to 500

title: Suspicious Module
summary:
Suspicious Modules appear as an Extremely Powerful (purple) icon with an X-like banner. They are black-market modifications of regular technologies in your exosuit, multi-tool, or starship.

Found in Buried Caches, bought using Tainted Metal from Scrap Dealers, or from random starships encountered on planets. 

* The stats for these types of modules are typically of a regular C-A class module. 
* Some upgrades may exceed the stats of an S-class module.
* Some upgrades may have no stats at all. If so, it displays the following text: "UPGRADE_0_STAT_ILLEGAL_DESC"
use_info:
When applied, all Suspicious Modules share almost the same description.

:"A suspicious black-market modification for the %SYSTEM%.

:Bypassing nearly every galactic standard for workmanship and safety, this upgrade module affects %STATS%."
additional_info: Suspicious Modules were initially priced at the Scrap Dealer for around 200-400 Tainted Metal. They can be sold to Technology Merchants for more than 500

title: Unstable Gel
summary: Unstable Gel is a tradeable that is used in crafting.
game_description:
A highly reactive gel, this substance is both energy-rich and dangerous to touch.

Crafted from Cactus Flesh.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Atlas Rises - Added as a component.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.
additional_info: The Unstable Gel blueprint is awarded when you construct the Science Terminal and continue the Scientist quest line.

title: Unstable Plasma
summary: Unstable Plasma is a consumable product.
game_description: Densely-packed fuel capsule for use in the land disruption grenade technology.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Release - Added as a product.
* NEXT - Blueprint changed, formerly used Thamium9 and Plutonium. Now it can be refined.
* Visions - Hidden changes: The information panel has an additional icon indicating its purpose.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.

title: Walker Brain
summary: Walker Brain is a component that is used for crafting.
game_description:
Shifting nanite clusters sewn together with a pugneum filament, this circuit is painfully hot to the touch.

A sinister purple light leaks from deep within its wiring, changing in intensity as it watches its holder.
source_info:
* Loot from a Envoy
* Suspicious Packet (Goods)
* Mission Board missions
* Nexus missions
* Can be found on a robot at the Harmonic Scrap point of interest
release_history:
* NEXT 1.58 - Icon changed.
* Origins - Can now be found in Scrap Dealer crates.
* Origins 3.05 - Tainted Metal is now used for purchasing instead of pugneum.
additional_info: * Sources extraced from the 3.75 version of the REWARDTABLE.MBIN game file.

title: Warp Cell
summary:
Warp Cell is a consumable product used to fuel the starship's hyperdrive.

It charges the hyperdrive for one jump, but 4 cells will charge the hyperdrive for 5 jumps.
game_description:
This antimatter-based fuel is one of the few power sources capable of meeting the incredible energy requirements of a starship hyperdrive.

Secured within a robust housing, the cell is guaranteed paradox-free during FTL travel.
release_history:
* Release - Original game component.
* NEXT - Formula changed, formerly used Thamium9 and Antimatter. Icon changed.
* Waypoint - Charging changed, now only 4 Warp Cells required to fully charge the hyperdrive, previously was 5.
additional_info: * You cannot sell Warp Cells.

title: Warp Hypercore
summary: Warp Hypercore is a consumable used to fuel the starship's hyperdrive. It offers a higher fuel capacity compared to a standard Warp Cell.
game_description:
A high-capacity antimatter-based fuel, this cell harnesses an internal black hole generator to power starship hyperdrives across multiple warp jumps.

Cell walls are specially designed to reflect any reality paradoxes back towards the heart of the unit, where they generate additional power.
source_info: *Blueprint can be found in Manufacturing Facilities and Operations Centres, or purchased from Synthesis Laboratory for 250
release_history:
* Beyond - Added as a consumable.
* Prisms - Added Synthesis Laboratory as a blueprint source.
* Endurance - Icon changed.

title: Wiring Loom
summary: Wiring Loom is a consumable product and used in crafting and repairing various technology components.
game_description:
A prefabricated circuit board, designed for flexible use in a large range of technology components.

The module features an integrated nanite processor, allowing it to be quickly configured for a wide variety of uses.
source_info: * Can be purchased at a
release_history: * Hazard Protection upgrades such as Neutron Shielding
